mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%Y') as `year`, DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%m') as `month` from shop_report group by DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%Y-%m')
select DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%Y') as `countDate`, sum(total) as `total` from shop_report group by DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%Y')

select DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%m') as `countDate`, sum(total) as `total` from shop_report
and INSTR(count_date,#{countDate}) > 0
group by DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%Y-%m')

select DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%d') as `countDate`, sum(total) as `total` from shop_report
and INSTR(count_date,#{countDate}) > 0
group by DATE_FORMAT(count_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
